abstract: The company cited pension settlements resulting from layoffs and voluntary separations for the drop.
snippet: The company cited pension settlements resulting from layoffs and voluntary separations for the drop.
lead_paragraph: Despite a strong lineup of smartphones powered by Google’s operating system, Verizon Communications on Friday reported a 25 percent drop in profit and a slowing growth of new customers in the third quarter.

headline.main: Verizon Profit Falls as Customer Growth Slows
headline.print_headline: Verizon Profit Falls as Customer Growth Slows
